name: Super Mario 64
overview: Unofficial native (without emulation) port of Super Mario 64 on Switch. Super Mario 64 is the first 3D video game about Mario, released in 1996 for Nintendo 64. It became the best-selling game for its platform (more than 11 million copies were sold in total) and one of the best-selling games in the history of games at that time – at the end of 2007 it was included in the Guinness Book of Records.
